hero.title: ESM GDSN Data Sync
hero.subtitle: Global Data Synchronization and Product Information Management Solutions
hero.description: Ensure data consistency across your supply chain by aligning your product information with global standards.ESM GDSN Data Sync is a data synchronization and exchange platform fully compliant with the GS1 Global Data Synchronisation Network (GDSN) standards.It enables secure, accurate and up-to-date product data sharing between manufacturers, distributors and retailers worldwide.

benefits: Synchronizes product data according to GS1 global standards.
Improves data accuracy and supply chain visibility.
Enables secure data exchange between suppliers, distributors and retailers.
Reduces manual data entry, saving time and cost.
Fully compatible with national and global GDSN networks.
